titleStmt.title: An answer to Sr. Timothy Touchstone at John the brewers lodging, at the sign of the Naked Truth, at Tyburn

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Timothy Touchstone's reply to Sir Anonymus, at Mr. Christian's lodgings, at the sign of the naked devil, between Hamden and Danby-Houses.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
